=== Who I am ===

I live in Maranhão, Brazil. My first contact with Linux happened when I was 11 years, and since then, I just love it!
Since the first time, I've used: Slackware, Kurumin, Red Hat. But Ubuntu is my true love. :-)

Every single day, I do something for Linux, Open Source, Free Software or Ubuntu, like talking about it to friends, translating an application to my native language, reporting bugs, helping users or developing softwares. And in the future, I hope to (and I will) do more and more for the community.
